00061     class Vector : public Matrix {
00062         public:
00064         Vector(const string& inName="") : Matrix(0, 1, inName) {}
00065         
00067         explicit Vector(unsigned int inSize, const string& inName="") : Matrix(inSize, 1, inName) {}
00068         
00070         explicit Vector(unsigned int inSize, double inValue, const string& inName="") : Matrix(inSize, 1, inValue, inName) {}
00071         
00073         Vector(const Matrix& inMatrix) : Matrix(inMatrix) {
00074             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::Vector() cannot convert matrix to vector!");
00075         }
00076         
00078         inline double& operator[](unsigned int inRow) {
00079             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::operator[] invalid vector!");
00080             PACC_AssertM(inRow < mRows, "Vector::operator[] invalid vector index!");
00081             return vector<double>::operator[](inRow);
00082         }
00083         
00085         inline const double& operator[](unsigned int inRow) const {
00086             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::operator[] invalid vector!");
00087             PACC_AssertM(inRow < mRows, "Vector::operator[] invalid vector index!");
00088             return vector<double>::operator[](inRow);
00089         }
00090         
00092         inline Vector operator+(double inScalar) const {
00093             Matrix lMatrix; 
00094             return add(lMatrix, inScalar);
00095         }
00096         
00098         inline Vector& operator+=(double inScalar) {
00099             return (Vector&) add((Matrix&)*this, inScalar);
00100         }
00101         
00103         inline Vector operator+(const Vector& inVector) const {
00104             Matrix lMatrix; 
00105             return add(lMatrix, inVector);
00106         }
00107         
00109         inline Vector& operator+=(const Vector& inVector) {
00110             return (Vector&) add((Matrix&)*this, inVector);
00111         }
00112

00115             Matrix lMatrix; 
00116             return add(lMatrix, inMatrix);
00117         }
00118

00121             return (Vector&) add((Matrix&)*this, inMatrix);
00122         }
00123

00126             Matrix lMatrix; 
00127             return subtract(lMatrix, inScalar);
00128         }

00132             return (Vector&) subtract((Matrix&)*this,inScalar);
00133         }

00138             return subtract(lMatrix, inVector);
00139         }

00143             return (Vector&) subtract((Matrix&)*this, inVector);

00150         }
00151

00155         }

00159             Matrix lMatrix; 
00160             return multiply(lMatrix, inScalar);
00161         }
00162

00165             return (Vector&) multiply((Matrix&)*this, inScalar);
00166         }
00167         
00169         inline Matrix operator*(const Matrix& inMatrix) const {
00170             Matrix lMatrix; 
00171             return multiply(lMatrix, inMatrix);
00172         }
00173         
00175         inline double operator*(const Vector& inVector) const {
00176             PACC_AssertM(mRows == inVector.mRows, "Vector::operator*() vector mismatch for inner product!");
00177             double lResult = 0;
00178             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) lResult += (*this)[i] * inVector[i];
00179             return lResult;
00180         }
00181         
00183         inline double computeL1Norm(void) const {
00184             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::computeL1Norm() invalid vector!");
00185             Matrix lResult;
00186             sumAbsColumns(lResult);
00187             return lResult(0,0);
00188         }
00189         
00191         inline double computeL2Norm(void) const {
00192             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::computeL2Norm() invalid vector!");
00193             Matrix lResult;
00194             sum2Columns(lResult);
00195             return sqrt(lResult(0,0));
00196         }
00197         
00199         inline double computeL2Norm2(void) const {
00200             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::computeL2Norm2() invalid vector!");
00201             Matrix lResult;
00202             sum2Columns(lResult);
00203             return lResult(0,0);
00204         }
00205         
00207         inline double computeLinfNorm(void) const {
00208             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::computeLinfNorm() invalid vector!");
00209             Matrix lResult;
00210             maxColumns(lResult);
00211             return lResult(0,0);
00212         }
00213         
00215         inline int getArgMax(void) const {
00216             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::getArgMax() invalid number of columns!");
00217             return distance(begin(), max_element(begin(), end()));
00218         }
00219         
00221         inline double getMax(void) const {
00222             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::getMax() invalid number of columns!");
00223             return *max_element(begin(), end());
00224         }
00225         
00227         inline int getArgMin(void) const {
00228             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::getArgMin() invalid number of columns!");
00229             return distance(begin(), min_element(begin(), end()));
00230         }
00231         
00233         inline double getMin(void) const {
00234             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::getMin() invalid number of columns!");
00235             return *min_element(begin(), end());
00236         }
00237         
00239         inline unsigned int size(void) const {
00240             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::size() invalid vector!");
00241             return mRows;
00242         }
00243         
00245         inline void resize(unsigned int inSize) {
00246             PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::resize() invalid vector!");
00247             Matrix::resize(inSize,1);
00248         }
00249

00252         
00254         void write(XML::Streamer& outStream, const string& inTag="Vector") const;
00255         
00256     };
